channel.title: Datmaker help
channel.description: right i need some help with datmaker i know how to zoom in and out but if i zoom realy close in how do i move it up coz im trying to animate something but it has alot of numbers so its hard but i can only do the bottom part of it coz i cant see the top part up close coz i dunno how to move it up please tell me how

item.title: Datmaker help
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“xcvxcv2, post:11, topic:284198”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=375644.msg2831781#msg2831781 date=1245416234]

I know there’s no need, im just so happy that i can finally afford a domain (cigarettes are getting me bankrupted lol)

@Warn - FlameWar against me.

cigs are like 40 - 50$ a carton over here…

and im guessing alot of people got into a flame war, i think 3 other ppl are warned now,
[/quote]

4 actually

umm the datmaker thing really helped me

since this topic is about datmaker, i heard that the colors were off when converting from meta to datmaker, is this true?[/quote]

sometimes, alot of times the colors look fine in datmaker but when you add them to the client they mess up, im pretty sure you have to have the pure color (red, blue, green, white etc…) or else itll show a weirdish combination of colors and it looks messed up.

Read full topic

item.title: Datmaker help
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:5, topic:284198”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=375644.msg2831727#msg2831727 date=1245411045]
its called panning, first you hold either Shift key on your keyboard.
Then, (while shift key is still held down) press and hold the right mouse button and then move the mouse.
[/quote]Mistery Solved!!! :)[/quote]

yw =P

Read full topic

item.title: Datmaker help
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

its called panning, first you hold either Shift key on your keyboard.
Then, (while shift key is still held down) press and hold the right mouse button and then move the mouse.
